name: Party Block
description:
What do you want, my friend? I can help at all what you needed!!!!

You will play your role as the host of the party. So you just service for your friend.
Hurry up, BRO!! 


::CONTROL::
ASWD - Movement
E - Interact
TAB - enter / exit house view
Left mouse button - drag to move the room.


Team Develop :: FUNNY CODING
